document_data.name: Bryndar Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody:
'''King Bryndar''' was the third [[Obarskyr]] monarch of [[Cormyr]].

He was born in [[44 DR|the Year of the Vow Manifest, 44 DR]], and was the only son of [[Imlon Obarskyr]], the second king of Cormyr. Bryndar reigned as king himself from [[57 DR|the Year of Lamplit Nights, 57 DR]], aged only 13, and ended his reign in [[64 DR|the Year of Gleaming Frost, 64 DR]], at age 20. Bryndar died young without producing an heir.

He was succeeded by his uncle, [[Eskruis Obarskyr|Eskruis]].
